## clone() function

Themes are read-only, this lets us create a new theme by overlaying new properties onto a previous one

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function clone(theme: Theme, updatedSpec?: ThemeSpec, updatedConfig?: ThemeConfig): Theme;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  theme | [Theme](./core.theme.md) | the theme |
|  updatedSpec | [ThemeSpec](./core.themespec.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> ThemeSpec with new values where needed |
|  updatedConfig | [ThemeConfig](./core.themeconfig.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> ThemeConfig with new values where needed |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Theme](./core.theme.md)
